florinciu joined #xwiki at 19:12  
jaredScott joined #xwiki at 19:56  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 19:58  
jaredScott - (20:04): Hello everyone  
jaredScott - (20:05): I am looking for the ratings system in XWiki Enterprise, but have not had any luck finding it  
florinciu left at 20:07 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
jaredScott - (20:08): The latest reference I have found is on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise222 - XWIKI-4590  
jaredScott - (20:09): If anyone could point me in the right direction that would be much appreciated  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 20:09  
sdumitriu - (20:11): Hi jaredScott  
sdumitriu - (20:11): The ratings plugin is not part of the official distribution  
jaredScott - (20:11): okay  
jaredScott - (20:13): I am suprised then that since it is not in the official distribution that it finds itself on a bug ticket (XWIKI-4950), unless I am mistaken  
jaredScott - (20:15): Besides that, would you happen to know where I could find more information about the ratings system, or a link to a XAR?  
sdumitriu - (20:15): https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/contrib/sandbox/xwiki-application-ratings/  
sdumitriu - (20:15): It's in the sandbox  
sdumitriu - (20:15): It's not released, but some people are using it  
vmassol left at 20:16 (Quit: Leaving.  
jaredScott - (20:26): hm okay  
jaredScott - (20:27): I will take a look at it then, thanks for pointing me in the right direction  
sdumitriu - (20:29): You're welcome  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 21:48  
jaredMScott joined #xwiki at 21:51  
jaredMScott - (21:54): I have gotten a hold of the XAR file for the Xwiki Ratings System, which includes four documents  
jaredMScott - (21:54): Looking at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Design/RatingSystem/RatingsDiagram.png , it seems that there should be an associated JAR file as well, right?  
sdumitriu - (21:54): Ah, right  
jaredMScott - (21:54): unfortunately http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XARATINGS is down right now  
jaredMScott - (21:54): :<  
sdumitriu - (21:55): https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/contrib/sandbox/xwiki-plugin-ratings/trunk/  
jaredMScott - (21:56): My coworker also just found something under the attachements at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RatingSystem#Attachments  
jaredMScott - (21:56): RatingSystemCode.zip  
jaredMScott - (21:56): looks like there is a JAR file there as well  
jaredMScott - (21:57): alright thanks  
jaredMScott - (21:57): hehe  
jaredMScott - (21:58): sometimes i put the blinders on - forgot about the plugin side to applications :/  
jaredMScott - (21:58): building it right now though, thanks  
jaredMScott - (21:59): And by the way, how do i disconnect old sessions on IRC? i lost connection and I can't remove jaredScott from the user list  
sdumitriu - (21:59): You must register your user name  
sdumitriu - (21:59): /nickserv help register  
sdumitriu - (22:01): Then you can ghost the old user with  
sdumitriu - (22:01): /nickserv ghost jaredScott [password]  
jaredMScott - (22:01): yes thank you  
florinciu left at 22:08 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
jaredScott left at 22:09 (  
jaredMScott - (22:09): okay  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 22:10  
jaredMScott - (22:10): I just realized that in windows 7 mIRC doesn't minimize to the start bar - it goes to the notification area

gvallarelli - (22:13): i.e. pidgin supports several protocols
